peterhuene commented on issue #6777:

Looks like Pat beat me to the review after all :sweat_smile: ; I was going to sneak in a review quickly so we can get this merged as the WASI adapters no longer validate with the latest wasm-tools, preventing me from bumping the deps for cargo-component.
